contentrichtext.text: {{Other uses|Maio (disambiguation)}} {{Infobox Islands | name = Maio | image name = Bela-vista-net-Maio-map.jpg | image caption = | image size = | locator map = Image-Locator map of Maio, Cape Verde.png | map_custom = | native name = ''Dja r’ Mai’'' | native name link = Cape Verdean Creole | nickname = | location = [[Atlantic Ocean]] | coordinates = {{coord|15|13|33|N|23|9|56|W||display=inline}} | archipelago = | total islands = | major islands = | area_km2 = 269 | length_km = 31 | width_km = 25 | highest mount = [[Monte Penoso]] | elevation_m = 436 | country = Cape Verde | country admin divisions title = ''Concelhos'' (Municipalities) | country admin divisions = [[Maio, Cape Verde (municipality)|Maio]] | country admin divisions title 1 = | country admin divisions 1 = | country admin divisions title 2 = | country admin divisions 2 = | country largest city = [[Vila do Maio]] | country largest city population = | population = | population as of = | density_km2 = | ethnic groups = | additional info = }} '''Maio''' (in [[Cape Verdean Creole]]: '''''Dja r’ Mai''''') is the easternmost of the [[Sotavento Islands|Sotavento]] islands of [[Cape Verde]]. Maio is located south of the islands of [[Boa Vista, Cape Verde|Boa Vista]] and east of [[Santiago, Cape Verde|Santiago]]. The island is known for its sandy beaches and large forest, which is unusual for Cape Verde. ==Geography== The island covers an area of 269 km². The tallest mountain on the island (436 m) is on the east coast, in a mountain range named [[Monte Penoso]]. '''Terra Salgadas''' is a plain filled with salt, in the far north. The northernmost point on the island is Ponta Cais. Bays includes Galeão and Santana to the north. The island’s main town is [[Vila do Maio]], also known as Porto Inglês, near which its [[airport]], [[Maio Airport]] lies. ===Settlements=== *[[Alcatraz, Cape Verde|Alcatraz]] *[[Barreiro, Cape Verde|Barreiro]] *[[Calheta, Cape Verde|Calheta]] *[[Figueira da Horta]] *[[Figueira Seca]] *[[Funchago]] *[[João, Cape Verde|João]] *[[Lagoa, Cape Verde|Lagoa]] *[[Monte Branco]] *[[Morro]] *[[Morrinho]] *[[Pedro Vaz (East Maio), Cape Verde|Pedro Vaz]], on Maio's east coast *[[Pedro Vaz (Galeão), Cape Verde|Pedro Vaz]], near Galeão *[[Pilão Cão]] *[[Porto Cais]] *[[Praia Gonçalo]] *[[Ribeira Dom João]] *[[Santo Antônio, Cape Verde|Santo Antônio]] *'''[[Vila do Maio]]''' (formerly Porto Inglês, meaning English Port) (pop: 1,561) ==History== It was named after its first sighting on May 1, 1460. ==Population== The island population is about 5,435 and the population density is 20.2/km². ==Demography== {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="8" | Population of Maio, Cape Verde (1940—2010) |- style="background-color:#80F0FF; text-align:center;" | '''1940'''<ref name="Stat">Source: [http://www.statoids.com/ucv.html Statoids]</ref> | '''1950'''<ref name="Stat" /> | '''1960'''<ref name="Stat" /> | '''1970'''<ref name="Stat" /> | '''1980'''<ref name="Stat" /> | '''1990'''<ref name="Stat" /> | '''2000'''<ref>Source: [http://www.ine.cv/index.aspx Instituto Nacional de Estatísticas].</ref> | '''2010'''<ref>Source: projection to 2010 from the [http://www.ine.cv/actualise%5Cdestaques%5CFiles%5CResultado%20de%20%20Revis%C3%A3o%20das%20Projec%C3%A7%C3%B5es%20Demograficas% Instituto Nacional de Estatísticas].</ref> |- style="text-align:center;" | 2237 | 1924 | 2680 | 3466 | 4098 | 4969 | 6754 | 8303 |} ==Economy== The island prospered around [[salt]] collecting, with a little [[agriculture]] and [[grazing]], but none of the industries are now profitable. ==Other== Maio has a few schools or a collegiate (''colegio''), a high school, churches, beaches including Galeão and Santana, hotels, a port serving to the islands of [[Boa Vista, Cape Verde|Boa Vista]] and [[Santiago, Cape Verde|Santiago]], and a square (''[[praça]]''). ==Sporting teams== {{Main article|Maio Island League}} *[[Académica da Calheta]] *[[Académico/83]] *[[Barreirense]] *[[Beira-Mar (Maio)|Beira-Mar]] *[[Onze Unidos]] *[[Santana de Morrinho]] ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.caboverde.com/ilhas/ymaio-it.htm caboverde.com] * [http://www.sodade.de/maio.htm Information about Maio by sodade.de] {{de icon}} * [http://www.bela-vista.net/Maio-Map-e.htm Map of Maio (scale: 1:50,000)] * [http://www.maiocv.com/ Maio, Cape Verde's Paradise] {{coord|15|13|33|N|23|9|56|W|region:CV_type:isle|display=title}} {{Commons|Maio, Cape Verde}} {{Islands of Cape Verde|Maio}} [[Category:Islands of Cape Verde]] [[Category:Maio, Cape Verde| ]]
